ClearCopy
Introducing ClearCopy, the ultimate Chrome extension designed to revolutionize the way you copy and paste text from platforms like ChatGPT, Bard, Slack, and many others into Google Docs, Microsoft Word, and beyond. Gone are the days of dealing with unwanted background colors or formatting issues. ClearCopy ensures that your text transfers carry over seamlesslyâ€”retaining essential formatting, such as bold and italics, but leaving behind any problematic backgrounds.
Key Features:
Seamless Integration: Works effortlessly with popular text-based platforms including ChatGPT, Bard, Slack, and more.
Background Cleanup: Automatically removes any background colors that may accompany copied text, ensuring clean, clear text in your documents.
Preserve Formatting: Maintains key text formatting, such as bold, italics, and underlines, so the essence of your message remains intact.
Easy to Use: With just one click, ClearCopy activates, making it incredibly user-friendly. No complicated settings or configurations.
Lightweight and Fast: Designed to be unobtrusive, ClearCopy operates smoothly in the background without slowing down your browsing experience.
Free to Use: ClearCopy is available at no cost, providing a valuable tool to enhance your productivity and document presentation.
Whether you're a professional copying important messages into a report, a student gathering information for a research paper, or just someone who loves keeping their documents neat and tidy, ClearCopy is the solution you've been waiting for. Say goodbye to formatting headaches and hello to effortless text transfer with ClearCopy.
